actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide compensation for the victims of crime.

summary.text: Compensates victims of crime for all resultant medical and hospital expenses excluding those compensated by insurance or otherwise. Stipulates that the State and the Federal Government shall each pay one half of such expenses, except when the crime is a Federal offense and not a State offense, in which case the Federal share will equal all such expenses. Excludes from compensation any victim whose earned income exceeds $15,000 annually, except in cases of total disability.

titles.title: A bill to provide compensation for the victims of crime.
